name: MADE iN SPACE
description:
MADE iN SPACE

MADE iN SPACE is about a lost ship AI trying to find its origin_
Play through as  a ship AI_
Navigate through planets and complete objectives_
Retrieve what was lost_
Until you discover the truth....._

FEATURES

  • Detail rich environment
  • Discover your past and retake what has been taken
  • Piece to gether your past while exploring
  • Adventure puzzle with RTS control

Made By:

Ratchanon Prapassornpong

Eiyaphat Suntiwong

Kanitpong Tangtrongchit 

Puh-Zang Liu

Auekarn Yapakdee

This project is part of the IDD CDT curriculum in Thammasat University 2021
